attributes.action: Bring pressure to bear on the BBC to dismiss Alan Yentob.
attributes.additional_details:
The Conservative MP Andrew Bridgen stated the following regarding Mr Yentobs attempted interference. 

"The allegation is a “conflict of interest” that did not “reflect well on him”.
attributes.background: It has become increasingly clear that the positions Alan Yentob holds with the BBC have now become untenable, his admitted attempts to delay transmission of a segment of Newsnight dealing with the Kids Company charity of which he was Chairman are testament to a clear conflict of interest.
